titles.title: Dismissing the election contest relating to the office of Representative from the at-large Congressional District of Alaska.
Dismissing the election contest relating to the office of Representative from the at-large Congressional District of Alaska.

action.text: The House Committee on House Administration reported an original measure, H. Rept. 119-53, by Mr. Steil.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 18.
